description: The minute Ryan walked though the door, I swore we heard the 'Halleluiah' chorus chiming down from heaven. He was the boy next door I'd been dying to get on film but proved so illusive....until now.From the dimples, to the twinkle in his eye to his friendly and open personality, he seems more like an Olympic gymnast that should be on a Wheaties' box then the cover boy for a porn video. That just makes him all the sexier. I had a feeling there was potenet sexuality lurking inside and boy...was I right!.Hard to pick a favorite on his tight little body but it has to be his firm round ass that is deserving of a Gold Medal all by itself. And when he starts to spank his dick...you'll see he loves that ass as much as I do. After a little fingering in the backfield...he pumps out a load of spunk that covered his abs, chest and a good portion of the couch.
title: Head Of The Class
